long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is chrome extension for the Incite to use their Gmail with SugarCRM. The plugin can log emails into SugarCRM. Moreover, it can create Opportunities, Calls etc using the Gmail data. The plugin will require Incite User SugarCRM login details to perform different actions. Without SugarCRM login credentials, the user can't perform any action. 

This plugin is only for Incite employees.
